item.title: Kamdhenu Ventures Ltd Stock Hits 52-Week Low Amid Continued Downtrend
item.description: Kamdhenu Ventures Ltd, a player in the paints sector, has touched a new 52-week and all-time low of Rs.4.49 today, marking a significant decline amid a sustained downward trend. item.title: Radiant Cash Management Services Ltd Hits All-Time Low Amid Prolonged Downtrend

item.title: Polycab India Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Signalling Increased Market Positioning
item.description: Polycab India Ltd has witnessed a notable surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, reflecting a marked shift in market positioning and investor sentiment. The 11.9% increase in open interest, coupled with rising volumes and strong price performance near its 52-week high, suggests growing bullish bets on the electrical cables giant amid steady fundamentals and sector outperformance. Time: 24 minutes ago
